# Course overview

Laboratory activities to reinforce topics covered in MATH 155 or equivalent. To further study and apply the concepts of descriptive and inferential statistics in a hands-on setting using technology. One-hour credit: Meets two hours per week. Prerequisites: C or better in MATH 155 or equivalent.


## Learning Objectives

<blockquote>

To introduce the concepts of descriptive and inferential statistics in a hands-on setting.

</blockquote>
